attributes.action: Make it compulsory for train conductors to say “all aboard” before people get on
attributes.additional_details: I have asked two train conductors why they do not say it and they said they got told not to , disgrace
attributes.background: Making conductors day “all aboard” at every station insures that people know this is a welcoming country and people are not discriminated against as “all” are welcome on board , we are Scotland and we say no to racism

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of individual train operating companies.
